chapters.title: Chapter 49: Just Another ManChapter 50: Veins of GoldEpilogue: Bathed in Light
chapters.info: Nalasia Merhan, p. 764—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She fled the Tower the day Egwene was raised, but was not on Verin's list of Black sisters. She is one of three candidates, in Egwene's mind, for Mesaana's alter ego. She is very weak in the Power.
